New Records: Pablo López reached a career-high 213 strikeouts for the season, the most by any Twins pitcher since Johan Santana fanned 235 in 2007.
Pablo López became the ninth Twins pitcher to reach the 200-strikeout threshold, and the first since José Berríos in 2018.
Key Match Events: Pablo López pitched eight scoreless innings against the Mets while fanning a career-high 14 batters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins had already secured their third consecutive series victory to begin September.
The loss didn't hurt them in terms of the standings, with the second-place Guardians losing to the Angels on Sunday afternoon.
Others: The Twins had to settle for a 2-0 loss to the Mets on Sunday at Target Field.
